title.rendered: Why We Charge a Sourcing Fee

content.rendered:
It’s 2:50 AM in China, and while Nairobi sleeps, our team is wide awake. Why do we charge a sourcing fee? Because “finding a supplier” is only 10% of the job. The other 90% is the grind: waking up at odd hours to negotiate, visiting factories in Guangzhou, and vetting the integrity of a company before you send a single shilling.

We don’t just find a factory; we give you their contacts and help you build a lasting relationship. Our fee is an investment in risk mitigation. We do the heavy lifting—the price negotiations and the background checks—so you can focus on growing your business. We value your time, and we ask that you value the expertise that keeps your investment safe.
